ru.ifmo.ctddev.qurbonzoda.implementor

Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.qurbonzoda.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler

    public class Implementor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Impler, JarImpler
    Generates class which implements supplied Class and locate the implementation to the supplied Path. This class supports interfaces and doesn't support abstract classes No Generics supported.

    The generated class has the same name as the interface with the Impl suffix. It is not abstract and compiles without errors. Methods of generated class ignore the arguments and returns the default value of the return type of the method.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method, entry point of the class.

        If the first arguments is "-jar", then method tries to implement interface given as the second argument which is in the jar-file given as the third argument. It looks like: -jar interface jar-file

        Otherwise, tries to generate class implementing interface given as the first argument, and locates it in the directory given as the second argument.

        Parameters:
        args - arguments from the command line

      • printUsage

        private static void printUsage()
        Prints usage of the class

      • implement

        public void implement(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                      java.nio.file.Path root)
               throws ImplerException
        Generates class which implements provided Class token and locate the implementation to the provided Path path. Class package directories will be created if they doesn't exist. Generated class implements provided interface and compiles without errors. Class and interface must not contain generics
        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - the interface to be implemented by the generated class
        root - the directory to locate the generated class
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if an error occurred while

      • implementClass

        private void implementClass(java.lang.Class clazz)
                     throws ImplerException
        Takes a Class as a clazz parameter and tries to implement it. If the the directories and package doesn't exist the method tries to create them.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the interface to implement
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if you don't have an exception occurs while processing this method. For instance, if you don't have required permissions to write in the given directories

      • writeClass

        private void writeClass(java.io.PrintWriter classWriter)
        This method prints generated class to the given PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        classWriter - the writer where to write the class

      • implementMethods

        private void implementMethods(java.lang.reflect.Method[] methods)

        Parameters:

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                         java.nio.file.Path jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Implements given interface and puts generated file in the jar-file.

        Creates temporary directory and generates implementation of the interface clazz with the name "classname" + "Impl.class". Puts this implementation and Manifest into given jarFile.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to implement to
        jarFile - file to print to
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if exitCode of compilation of the implementing class is not 0

      • createJar

        private static void createJar(java.nio.file.Path root,
                              java.lang.String jarFile,
                              java.lang.String classFile)
        Packs the class in the given jar-file.

        Puts Manifest and compiled class-file classFile in the the given jarFile in the given directory root.

        Parameters:
        root - directory to locate jarFile
        jarFile - JarFile to write to
        classFile - String representing classFile of the Class

      • compile

        private static int compile(java.nio.file.Path root,
                           java.lang.String file)
        Returns result of the compiling.

        Compiles the given file in the directory root and returns the exit code of the compilation

        Parameters:
        root - directory where the file is located
        file - name of the file to compile
        Returns:
        int resulting code of the compilation
